# BuildBuddy Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview

BuildBuddy is a hackathon team-building platform built with Next.js, shadcn UI, and Django backend.

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14+ (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn UI
- **Backend**: Django (to be configured)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with shadcn UI components

## Project Structure

- `/app` - Next.js App Router pages and layouts
- `/components` - Reusable React components
- `/lib` - Utility functions and configurations
- `/public` - Static assets
- `/backend` - Django backend (placeholder for future development)

## Development Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js 14+ App Router conventions
- Use shadcn UI components for consistent design
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Add placeholder data for backend integration points
